metadata.name: MABATAKI
metadata.description:
I had been thinking of an illustration to submit to FND for a long time.

I drew illustrations that included the background and illustrations that included the characters, but I could not come up with anything that satisfied me.
I like to draw cute girl characters.

So I decided to animate the moment when a girl feels the cutest.
Animation is not an easy thing to do because it requires many drawings.
It took me a long time to draw this blinking moment of the cutest girl.
I hope you will make eye contact with her.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
